subject: Al Khalifa Finance House
body:
Al Khalifa Finance House
 15th floor, Almoayyed tower 2504,
 Seef 428, Bahrain
 
 Dear Sir,
 
 My name is Mr. Alberic Kacou, senior loan officer at Al khalifa Finance
 House. We are a Group of Investors and independent financial advisors in
 Bahrain seeking to expand our portfolio globally. If you have viable
 projects requiring funding or business clients who need funds for new
 projects or to expand existing businesses, kindly indicate in your response
 to this message?
 
 We offer corporate and personal loans at 3% interest rate for the duration
of 15 years for residence of Bahrain and other part of the world
We also pay 1.2% commission to brokers who introduce project owners for
 finance or other opportunities, kindly keep me posted if you are interested
 in more details.
 
 Thanking you for your understanding and cooperation, while I look forward
 to your kind and considerate response.
 
 
 Regards,
 Mr. Alberic Kacou.
 
Staff, Alkhalifa finance

subject: Re:   Al Khalifa Finance House
body:
Dear Mr. Alberic Kacou,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I appreciate your interest in expanding your portfolio globally. Could you please provide me with more information about the types of projects or businesses that your company is interested in funding? 

Additionally, I would like to know more about the terms and conditions of the corporate and personal loans that you offer. What are the interest rates and repayment options available? Are there any specific requirements or qualifications that applicants need to meet?

Furthermore, could you please explain how the commission system works for brokers who introduce project owners for finance? What percentage of commission do you offer, and how is it calculated?

I look forward to receiving your response and learning more about the opportunities you have available.

Best wishes,
Norma

subject: OUR TERMS AND CONDITION
Re: OUR TERMS AND CONDITION
body:
Hello! How can I help you today?

Best wishes,
Norma

subject: OUR TERMS AND CONDITION
body:
Dear Norma,

If you are serious  send to me your full details your working telephone

Regards .

subject: Re: OUR TERMS AND CONDITION
body:
Dear Alberic,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your interest in discussing things further. However, before I provide any personal information, could you please share more details about what exactly you would like to discuss? It would be helpful to have a better understanding of the topic or purpose of our conversation.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Norma

subject: NORMA LET ME HEAR FROM YOU.
body:
Dear Norma,

Thanks for your urgent response.

Yes I have a very good friend in Nigeria a  senator that want  someone  who
he will trust to invest some huge amount of money  in dollars for him.

If you are interested let me know so that  I will give you his contact.

Awaiting your response.

Regards.

Alberic

subject: Re: NORMA LET ME HEAR FROM YOU.
body:
Dear Alberic,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm definitely interested in learning more about this opportunity. Could you please provide me with some additional details about the investment? How much money are we talking about, and what kind of returns can be expected?

I appreciate your help in connecting me with your friend in Nigeria. It's important for me to establish trust before proceeding further. Can you tell me a bit more about your friend, the senator? What is his background and experience in investments?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Norma

subject: NORMA LET ME HEAR FROM YOU.
body:
Dear Norma,


The man in question we are talking about is senator Clifford Ordia .

The  money involve is  $130.000.000 and now the funds is stored  in Paris .

Can you be able to go there for the claim??? As he want  who will keep his
name secret in this project as he is still in government.


Norma, where are you located???.

Awaiting your response.

Regards.

Alberic.

subject: Re: NORMA LET ME HEAR FROM YOU.
body:
Dear Alberic,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I must admit, I'm quite intrigued by what you've shared. Senator Clifford Ordia sounds like an important figure, and it's interesting that the funds are stored in Paris.

However, I have a few questions before we proceed. How did you come across this information? Is there any specific reason why Senator Ordia wants his name to be kept secret in this project? Also, could you please clarify what exactly my role would be if I were to go to Paris for the claim?

I appreciate your patience in answering these questions. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Norma

subject: NORMA LET ME HEAR FROM YOU.
body:
Dear Norma,

Thank you for your email.

The reason why he doesn't want his name to be mention  is because he is
still in government .

The information is from him as a friend he believe I will keep the secret
for him.

So if you Are willing and ready to work with him you let me know so that I
can give you his  direct Whatsapp number to discuss with him believe you me
you will have many things to gain from him in the near future that is if
you are straight forward to him because he is a very  good person.

I believe with my explanation  you can get in touch with him and you will
never regret in working  with him .

Where are you located ????


Regards.
Alberic.

subject: NORMA LET ME HEAR FROM YOU.
body:
Norma,

Your role is to go to Paris claim the funds and look for  lucrutive
investment that you know it will benefit both of you in  future.

So you give me your full details so that I can forward to him  and let him
know about this development to open communication with you.

I believe from there he will tell you more.

Regards.

Alberic.

subject: Re: NORMA LET ME HEAR FROM YOU.
body:
Dear Alberic,

Thank you for your response. I understand that your friend prefers to keep his name confidential due to his current government position. I appreciate your trust in me to maintain this secret.

I am definitely interested in learning more about the opportunity and discussing it further with your friend. Please provide me with his direct Whatsapp number so that we can connect and explore the potential benefits of working together.

Regarding my location, I am currently based in . However, I would like to know more about what this opportunity entails before sharing any personal details.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Norma

subject: Re: NORMA LET ME HEAR FROM YOU.
body:
Hello Alberic,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm interested in learning more about this opportunity. Could you please provide me with some additional details? What exactly is the nature of this investment? How much funds are we talking about?

I would also like to know more about the person I will be working with in Paris. Can you tell me a bit about him and his background? It's important for me to have a clear understanding of who I will be dealing with.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,

subject: NORMA,HIS WHATSAPP NUMBER .
body:
Dear Norma,

The person you are going to me in Paris is senator  Clifford Ordia
representative there in Paris that will direct you on how to claim the said
funds.

I have told you before the total sum is  $130.000.000.00 ( One hundred and
thirty million United States dollars) Are you capable of handling such huge
amount of money  for investment.???.

You did not indicate where you are currently living.

Below is the senator Clifford Ordia whatsapp number. +234-802641-5265
Please keep it secret and open communication with him

I  will tell him about you now.


Regards.
Alberic.

subject: NORMA, NO MORE QUESTION FROM YOU PLEASE.
body:
I have no other information I have to give you about the senator.

You contact him and he will tell you more about him but one thing you must
know senator Clifford Ordia is not a man of  too many words. he believe in
action and what you can do.

I am sorry after this I will not answer you again as I have done my best to
make you understand this deal.

Contact him and let me know.

Good night.

Regards.

Alberic.

subject: Re: NORMA, NO MORE QUESTION FROM YOU PLEASE.
body:
Hello Alberic,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to share information about Senator Clifford Ordia. It's interesting to hear that he is a man of action and believes in what one can do.

I would like to know more about the senator and his accomplishments. Can you provide some specific examples of the actions he has taken or the things he has achieved during his time in office? It would be helpful to understand his track record and how he has made a positive impact on his constituents.

Also, could you please let me know how I can contact Senator Clifford Ordia directly? I would like to learn more from him firsthand.

Thank you again for your assistance, and have a good night!

Best wishes,
Norma

subject: Re: NORMA, NO MORE QUESTION FROM YOU PLEASE.
body:
